lead_paragraph: If they had a home, refugees would belong to the world's 24th most populous nation, just behind Italy. On Tuesday, there were honored as members of the Olympic family.

headline.print_headline: Olympic Honor for Refugees: Rio Flame Stops at UN Camp
headline.main: Olympic Honor for Refugees: Rio Flame Stops at UN Camp
